comment.body: @Alex-302 Hi, Tried to reproduce the issue. Under exact same setting, except Windows 10 has been updated to 19045.3570 (I don't think this would make a difference though). NEW test result occured: Last time HEVC was able to load, but this time I tried all 3 encodings ( AV1, HEVC and AVC) none of it loaded. For you information, I disabled all other browser plugins while testing as well as OS level vpn or proxy. Also, I checked DNS shouldn't be a problem.
